item.title: Automatised search for low surface brightness galaxies
item.description: During my 2 month stay at the Institute of Astrophysics of the Canary Islands, I developed a pipeline to automatically search for and measure low surface brightness galaxies in the Stripe82 SDSS survey images.

item.title: Satellite galaxies of the Magellanic Clouds with DELVE
item.description: I am leading an automatised search for stellar overdensities within the DELVE-MC catalogue, which covers the entire Magellanic Clouds and their peripheries. This could result in the discovery of new ultra-faint dwarf galaxies or star clusters.

item.title: Star Formation History of the Small Magellanic Cloud galaxy
item.description: I am working on the star formation history of the Small Magellanic Cloud galaxy using photometric data from the SMASH survey (Survey of the MAgellanic Stellar History).
